titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for the Rudolph H. Kampmeier Papers

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

repository.corpname: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

did.unittitle: Rudolph H. Kampmeier Papers

arrangement.p: The materials in the Rudolph H. Kampmeier Collection are arranged in alphabetical order. Brackets were used when a location was not positively known.
